name: GetFolderFiles
description:
Retrieve files and images from a specific folder.

Use this tool to get a list of available images and files stored in a specified folder within Mailchimp's file manager. Ideal for accessing and managing digital assets.

parameters.name: file_manager_folder_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific File Manager folder to retrieve files from.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the File Manager folder.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Use dot notation for sub-object fields.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: number_of_records
parameters.description: Specifies the number of files to retrieve, with a default of 10 and a maximum of 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0. Use this to access pages beyond the first one.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: file_type
parameters.description: Specifies the file type to filter files in the folder. Use to retrieve specific types like 'image', 'document', etc.

value_schema.description: The file type for the File Manager file.

parameters.name: file_creator_user
parameters.description: Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file. Filter results by this user's contributions.

value_schema.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

parameters.name: restrict_files_before_date
parameters.description: Restrict response to files created before this date using ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: filter_files_created_after
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created after the specified date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: sort_by_field
parameters.description: Specify the field to sort the files by, such as name or size.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort_order_direction
parameters.description: Specify the order direction for sorting results. Typically 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending order.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.
